entry.title: Day 28 - The lights are red
entry.content:
Back to normal on the cycling today, all and I mean all the lights were red this morning and I had to stop.  Only other thing of note is all the docks in Kings Cross were full and I had to go find another dock to put the bike.  Wow, living the dream!

Stats (Bike Totals):

Distance: 3.52 mi
Duration: 00:24:58
Avg. Pace: 7:06min/mi

entry.title: Day 27 - All the lights are green
entry.content:
Wow - what a cycle ride this morning!  All the lights were green and it was smooth riding all the way - under 10 mins!  Cycle home was less good but its all helping me get used to cycling. I love running and cycling still feels alien but if I'm to do a triathlon its something I have to master.

Stats (Bike Totals):
Distance: 3.36 mi
Duration: 00:21:38
Avg. Pace: 6:16min/mi

entry.title: Day 21 - Daily Commute
entry.content:
Not much to report, a good days cycling on the commute, no instances, no drama!

 

Stats (Bike Totals):

Distance: 3.49 mi 

Duration: 00:25:14

Avg. Pace: 7:14min/mi

entry.title: Day 20 - Commute and Gym
entry.content:
Finally, I can use the gym, I'm paying for!  After signing up and paying on MondayI was told I had to do an induction before being allowed to use the gym.  Well, I went last night and after being wieghed, measured; height, blood pressure and pulse: 14st 10lb, 193cm, 83/130, 48 bpm.  I told them I had used the gym before and after being tested I could use a machine, they said I was free to use the gym! So I spent 30 mins doing some weights and finished off with a 5 minute row.

If anyone has any good advice on resources for planning a core strength workout - let me know!  Its my main area of focus for the gym in prep for my first Olympic triathlon in July!

The commute was good, did my fastest time to kings cross in the evening!  However, I did see on cyclist take out a young lady who stepped out into the cycling lane at a traffic lights without looking - note to self cycle defensively!

Stats (Bike Totals):

Distance: 3.4 mi 

Duration: 00:24:06

Avg. Pace: 7:04min/mi
